I currently have my first asteroid in orbit and am waiting until I complete the R&D tree to do stuff with it. I WILL be adding wings to it and flying it to KSC hopefully

Here is my station orbiting Kerbin at about 300km. It's made up of two roids because the first one I captured was too small so I went out and got another one.

I modified the cfg file for the Port-a-Hatch to allow it to work with KAS and increased the Kerbal count to 15. That way I was able to attach it directly to the asteroid during EVA. I also modded the docking ports so that I could attach them directly to the roid. This allows me to make believe that the Kerbals hollowed out the roid to use as a station. The 3 wheels make for comfortable living with gravity for 12 Kerbals. The lifeboat only holds 16 Kerbals so I limit the number to 12 at any one time. The orange tanks hold fuel so that visiting ships can refuel if they need to. All modules are docked so the Kerbals don't have to EVA to go from a module to the interior.
